about_the_game:
Step into the spotlight with the WWE 2K24 MyRISE Mega-Boost and improve your MyPLAYER with 200 Attribute Points at your disposal. The MyRISE Mega-Boost is one of the many items included in the Season Pass, which comes included with the WWE 2K24 Deluxe and Forty Years of WrestleMania editions.

The MyRISE Mega-Boost is included as part of the Season Pass, and the Season Pass is included in the WWE 2K24 Deluxe and Forty Years of WrestleMania Editions.
detailed_description:
Step into the spotlight with the WWE 2K24 MyRISE Mega-Boost and improve your MyPLAYER with 200 Attribute Points at your disposal. The MyRISE Mega-Boost is one of the many items included in the Season Pass, which comes included with the WWE 2K24 Deluxe and Forty Years of WrestleMania editions.

The MyRISE Mega-Boost is included as part of the Season Pass, and the Season Pass is included in the WWE 2K24 Deluxe and Forty Years of WrestleMania Editions.

pc_requirements.minimum:

short_description: Step into the spotlight with the WWE 2K24 MyRISE Mega-Boost—included with the WWE 2K24 Deluxe and Forty Years of WrestleMania Editions—and receive 200 Attribute Points to improve your MyPLAYER.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic
*languages with full audio support
